meanings.definition: In a manner related to osmosis.
meanings.sent1: The water moved osmotically through the membrane.
meanings.sent2: The sugar dissolved osmotically in the solution.
meanings.sent3: The salt tried to sneak osmotically into the water, but it was caught!
meanings.sent4: The information flowed osmotically from one person to another.
meanings.sent5: The nutrients were absorbed osmotically by the plant roots.

meanings.sent2: The medication was delivered osmotically into the bloodstream.
meanings.sent3: The flavors mixed osmotically in the stew, creating a delicious blend.
meanings.sent4: The ideas spread osmotically throughout the community.
meanings.sent5: The colors merged osmotically on the canvas, forming a beautiful painting.
